nodes.text: Nacronis ground control was a supposed local starship traffic control organization of Nacronis. After participating in the destruction of Nacronis, Imperial defector Yrica Quell claimed in a falsified report to IT-O of the New Republic that she had attempted to contact Nacronis ground control for aide during her apparent defection, although she was aware that they could be jammed, out of range, or were to ignore her.
